Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al Aswad scored for Syria in the seventh minute
Daleho Mohsen Irandust scored for Syria in the 77th minute
Pablo Sabbag scored in injury time
Pre-Game Insights: Manolo Marquez began his stint as India head coach after succeeding Igor Stimac
This was the first time Syria won a title on Indian soil
Post-Match Reflections: India's hopes of winning the Intercontinental Cup title for the third time were dashed
The result meant that Manolo Marquez started his tenure on a disappointing note
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at GMC Balayogi Athletics Stadium in Hyderabad
India and Mauritius finished the tournament on one point each after playing out a goalless draw on September 3
Syria had beaten Mauritius 2-0 in their opening match and thus ended the round-robin league with six points
